name: Whispers of West Grove
storyline:
Discover the true power of light in Whispers of West Grove, a psychological horror set in an atmosphere of growth and decay. Playing as a patient #001 in West Grove Psychiatric Hospital, you find that actions in your dreams affect reality. By using this ability you can attempt to escape the increasingly dangerous treatments of Dr. Kade, before it’s too late.

With a foggy memory, explore your dreams to retrieve items and uncover clues to help you to remember the past. However, one must tread carefully when exploring the town of West Grove. Dreams can quickly turn into nightmares when creatures of the asylum start hunting you. Find weapons, supplies, and other characters to aid in your survival. If all else fails, shift the light to outsmart your foes.
summary: A heart-pounding adventure taking place in the twisted town of West Grove. Play as a patient trapped in a world where dream and reality begin to blur. Use light to solve puzzles, reveal hidden items, and transform objects to explore in a way like never before.
